00037 
00041 class RngValidator {
00042 public:
00043     RngValidator();
00044 
00048     RngValidator(const RngValidator& orig);
00049     
00050     virtual ~RngValidator();
00051 
00060     static bool run(const std::string& xml_file_pathname, const std::string& rng_file_pathname);
00061 private:
00062     // Don't know what this handles, can't get it to fire.
00063     static void readerErr(void* arg, const char* const msg, xmlParserSeverities severity, xmlTextReaderLocatorPtr locator);
00064 
00065     // handles well-formedness errors in instance document
00066     // and handles validity errors in instance doc
00067     static void structErr(void* userData, xmlErrorPtr error);
00068 
00069     // handles warnings encountered while parsing RNG schema
00070     static void rngWarn(void* ctx, const char* const msg, xmlParserSeverities severity, xmlTextReaderLocatorPtr locator);
00071 
00072     // handles errors encountered while parsing RNG schema
00073     static void rngErr(void* ctx, const char* const msg, xmlParserSeverities severity, xmlTextReaderLocatorPtr locator);
00074     
00075     virtual void iAmAbstract() = 0;
00076 };
